metadata.title: CVE-2020-1757 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in all undertow-2.x.x SP1 versions prior toundertow-2.0.30.SP1, all undertow-1.x.x and undertow-2.x.x versions priorto undertow-2.1.0.Final, where the Servlet container causes servletPath tonormalize incorrectly by truncating the path after semicolon which may leadto an application mapping resulting in the security bypass.

criterions.comment: undertow: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
